name: pnp-graph-connector-nodejs-typescript-policies-dc
title: Declarative copilot with a Copilot connector that ingests policies using TypeScript on Node.js
shortDescription: This sample contains a Declarative copilot with a Copilot connector that shows how to ingest local policies into Microsoft 365. For each file, it extracts the metadata from front matter, maps them to the external connection's schema and ingests the content retaining the content and metadata. The ingested content is set to be visible to everyone in the organization.
